content: Use cases: we had at least 6 people each volunteering to share a use case for $import. Please do so by creating a PR against https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/bulk-import/blob/master/use-cases.md .
Come on, other 5 people :sunglasses:

Mine is pretty similar to the one already added.

One question I do have is: what is the rationale behind making inputSource mandatory? Does that mean I can't be a client unless I have a FHIR endpoint?

Surely that is a pretty high bar for clients that may not have a need for smart update or referential integrity.

Ok, I've just read this past message:

Proposal: keep inputSource as required, but update docs to note that it's a URI, specified by the client, meant to track data imported through its lifecycle. Use "a FHIR server base URL" as an example but not the definition of this field.

Should I create a pull request to action this change?
I've added ours, its in a pull request
Added a quality reporting data submission use case.
